title: YDS Academic Vocabulary - High-Frequency Words
description: 50 essential academic words frequently tested in YDS exams, with comprehensive definitions, examples, and usage patterns

cards.englishDefinition: to accept or admit the existence or truth of something
cards.exampleSentence: The researchers acknowledged the limitations of their study.
cards.exampleTranslation: Araştırmacılar çalışmalarının sınırlılıklarını kabul ettiler.

cards.englishDefinition: coming after something in time; following
cards.exampleSentence: Subsequent research confirmed the initial findings.
cards.exampleTranslation: Sonraki araştırmalar ilk bulguları doğruladı.

cards.englishDefinition: complete and including everything that is necessary
cards.exampleSentence: The study provides a comprehensive analysis of climate change.
cards.exampleTranslation: Çalışma iklim değişikliği hakkında kapsamlı bir analiz sunuyor.

cards.englishDefinition: to show or prove something clearly
cards.exampleSentence: The experiment demonstrated the effectiveness of the new method.
cards.exampleTranslation: Deney yeni yöntemin etkinliğini gösterdi.

cards.englishDefinition: large or important enough to have an effect or be noticed
cards.exampleSentence: There has been a significant increase in temperature over the past decade.
cards.exampleTranslation: Son on yılda sıcaklıkta önemli bir artış oldu.

cards.englishDefinition: to make an action or process easier
cards.exampleSentence: Technology can facilitate communication between researchers worldwide.
cards.exampleTranslation: Teknoloji dünya çapındaki araştırmacılar arasında iletişimi kolaylaştırabilir.

cards.englishDefinition: to give special importance or attention to something
cards.exampleSentence: The report emphasizes the need for immediate action.
cards.exampleTranslation: Rapor acil eylem ihtiyacını vurguluyor.

cards.englishDefinition: to obtain or receive something from a source
cards.exampleSentence: Many English words derive from Latin and Greek.
cards.exampleTranslation: Birçok İngilizce kelime Latince ve Yunanca'dan türemiştir.

cards.englishDefinition: to put a plan or system into operation
cards.exampleSentence: The government plans to implement new educational policies.
cards.exampleTranslation: Hükümet yeni eğitim politikalarını uygulamayı planlıyor.

cards.englishDefinition: to create or set up an organization, system, or set of rules
cards.exampleSentence: The university was established in 1950.
cards.exampleTranslation: Üniversite 1950'de kuruldu.

cards.englishDefinition: to make known something that was previously secret or unknown
cards.exampleSentence: The study revealed surprising patterns in student behavior.
cards.exampleTranslation: Çalışma öğrenci davranışında şaşırtıcı kalıplar ortaya çıkardı.

cards.englishDefinition: to be the parts that form something; to be considered as something
cards.exampleSentence: Women constitute 40% of the workforce in this sector.
cards.exampleTranslation: Kadınlar bu sektördeki işgücünün %40'ını oluşturuyor.

cards.englishDefinition: to improve the quality, amount, or strength of something
cards.exampleSentence: These exercises will enhance your language skills.
cards.exampleTranslation: Bu alıştırmalar dil becerilerinizi geliştirecek.

cards.englishDefinition: to commit oneself to and begin an enterprise or responsibility
cards.exampleSentence: The team undertook a comprehensive review of the literature.
cards.exampleTranslation: Ekip literatürün kapsamlı bir incelemesini üstlendi.

cards.englishDefinition: enough in quantity or good enough in quality for a particular purpose
cards.exampleSentence: The funding was not adequate for the research project.
cards.exampleTranslation: Finansman araştırma projesi için yeterli değildi.

cards.englishDefinition: a fact or event that can be observed and studied
cards.exampleSentence: Climate change is a global phenomenon that affects everyone.
cards.exampleTranslation: İklim değişikliği herkesi etkileyen küresel bir olgudur.

cards.englishDefinition: to evaluate or estimate the nature, ability, or quality of something
cards.exampleSentence: Teachers need to assess students' progress regularly.
cards.exampleTranslation: Öğretmenlerin öğrencilerin ilerlemesini düzenli olarak değerlendirmesi gerekir.

cards.englishDefinition: to appear or become known
cards.exampleSentence: New technologies emerge every year in this field.
cards.exampleTranslation: Bu alanda her yıl yeni teknolojiler ortaya çıkıyor.

cards.englishDefinition: to support or actively encourage a process or idea
cards.exampleSentence: The campaign aims to promote healthy eating habits.
cards.exampleTranslation: Kampanya sağlıklı beslenme alışkanlıklarını teşvik etmeyi amaçlıyor.

cards.englishDefinition: the state of being strikingly different from something else
cards.exampleSentence: In contrast to previous studies, our findings suggest a different conclusion.
cards.exampleTranslation: Önceki çalışmaların aksine, bulgularımız farklı bir sonuç öneriyor.

cards.englishDefinition: to continue to have something; to keep in one's possession
cards.exampleSentence: Students retain information better when they practice regularly.
cards.exampleTranslation: Öğrenciler düzenli pratik yaptıklarında bilgiyi daha iyi korurlar.

cards.englishDefinition: to gather or collect gradually over time
cards.exampleSentence: Evidence has accumulated over the years supporting this theory.
cards.exampleTranslation: Bu teoriyi destekleyen kanıtlar yıllar içinde birikti.

cards.englishDefinition: forming a necessary base or core; of central importance
cards.exampleSentence: Understanding grammar is fundamental to language learning.
cards.exampleTranslation: Dilbilgisini anlamak dil öğrenmede temeldir.

cards.englishDefinition: to make practical and effective use of something
cards.exampleSentence: Researchers utilized advanced statistical methods in their analysis.
cards.exampleTranslation: Araştırmacılar analizlerinde gelişmiş istatistiksel yöntemler kullandılar.

cards.englishDefinition: to continue to exist or occur over a prolonged period
cards.exampleSentence: The problems persist despite numerous attempts to solve them.
cards.exampleTranslation: Problemler çözmek için sayısız girişime rağmen sürüyor.

cards.englishDefinition: to be a part of a whole
cards.exampleSentence: These factors constitute the main causes of the problem.
cards.exampleTranslation: Bu faktörler sorunun ana nedenlerini oluşturuyor.

cards.englishDefinition: to regard something as being caused by someone or something
cards.exampleSentence: Researchers attribute the decline to environmental factors.
cards.exampleTranslation: Araştırmacılar düşüşü çevresel faktörlere bağlıyor.

cards.englishDefinition: to suggest something without stating it directly
cards.exampleSentence: The data imply that further research is needed.
cards.exampleTranslation: Veriler daha fazla araştırmanın gerekli olduğunu ima ediyor.

cards.englishDefinition: to show or prove to be right or reasonable
cards.exampleSentence: The results justify the time and effort invested in the project.
cards.exampleTranslation: Sonuçlar projeye yatırılan zaman ve çabayı haklı çıkarıyor.

cards.englishDefinition: the possibility or likelihood of some future event occurring
cards.exampleSentence: The prospect of finding a cure seems more realistic now.
cards.exampleTranslation: Bir tedavi bulma olasılığı şimdi daha gerçekçi görünüyor.

cards.englishDefinition: to make or become less
cards.exampleSentence: The importance of this issue should not be diminished.
cards.exampleTranslation: Bu konunun önemi küçümsenmemelidir.

cards.englishDefinition: certain to happen; unavoidable
cards.exampleSentence: Change is inevitable in any organization.
cards.exampleTranslation: Değişim herhangi bir organizasyonda kaçınılmazdır.

cards.englishDefinition: to experience or be subjected to something
cards.exampleSentence: The company underwent major restructuring last year.
cards.exampleTranslation: Şirket geçen yıl büyük bir yeniden yapılanma geçirdi.

cards.turkishDefinition: hakim olmak, galip gelmek, yaygın olmak
cards.englishDefinition: to be widespread or current in a particular area or time
cards.exampleSentence: The conditions that prevailed in the 19th century were very different.
cards.exampleTranslation: 19. yüzyılda hakim olan koşullar çok farklıydı.

cards.englishDefinition: to consist of; to be made up of
cards.exampleSentence: The committee comprises experts from various fields.
cards.exampleTranslation: Komite çeşitli alanlardan uzmanlardan oluşuyor.

cards.englishDefinition: to cause or allow something to continue for a period of time
cards.exampleSentence: The organization works to sustain environmental conservation efforts.
cards.exampleTranslation: Kuruluş çevresel koruma çabalarını sürdürmek için çalışıyor.

cards.englishDefinition: unwilling and hesitant; disinclined
cards.exampleSentence: Many people are reluctant to change their habits.
cards.exampleTranslation: Birçok insan alışkanlıklarını değiştirmekte isteksizdir.

cards.englishDefinition: logical and consistent; forming a unified whole
cards.exampleSentence: The argument presented in the paper is clear and coherent.
cards.exampleTranslation: Makalede sunulan argüman net ve tutarlıdır.

cards.englishDefinition: stated clearly and in detail, leaving no room for confusion
cards.exampleSentence: The instructions give explicit directions for assembly.
cards.exampleTranslation: Talimatlar montaj için açık yönergeler veriyor.

cards.englishDefinition: recognizably different in nature from something else
cards.exampleSentence: There are three distinct stages in the process.
cards.exampleTranslation: Süreçte üç farklı aşama vardır.

cards.englishDefinition: to include something as part of a whole
cards.exampleSentence: The new curriculum incorporates recent research findings.
cards.exampleTranslation: Yeni müfredat son araştırma bulgularını içeriyor.

cards.englishDefinition: able to exist or occur together without conflict
cards.exampleSentence: The new policy is compatible with existing regulations.
cards.exampleTranslation: Yeni politika mevcut düzenlemelerle uyumludur.

cards.englishDefinition: open to more than one interpretation; unclear
cards.exampleSentence: The statement was deliberately ambiguous to avoid controversy.
cards.exampleTranslation: İfade tartışmadan kaçınmak için kasıtlı olarak belirsizdi.

cards.englishDefinition: giving rise to public disagreement
cards.exampleSentence: The proposed policy remains highly controversial.
cards.exampleTranslation: Önerilen politika oldukça tartışmalı olmaya devam ediyor.

cards.englishDefinition: extremely thorough and careful
cards.exampleSentence: The study employed rigorous scientific methods.
cards.exampleTranslation: Çalışma titiz bilimsel yöntemler kullandı.

cards.englishDefinition: denoting an action or event preceding or done in preparation for something
cards.exampleSentence: Preliminary results suggest a positive trend.
cards.exampleTranslation: Ön sonuçlar olumlu bir eğilim gösteriyor.

cards.englishDefinition: based on random choice or personal whim, rather than reason
cards.exampleSentence: The selection process seemed arbitrary and unfair.
cards.exampleTranslation: Seçim süreci keyfi ve adaletsiz görünüyordu.

cards.englishDefinition: to become progressively worse
cards.exampleSentence: Health conditions deteriorated rapidly during the crisis.
cards.exampleTranslation: Kriz sırasında sağlık koşulları hızla kötüleşti.

cards.englishDefinition: something that completes or enhances something else
cards.exampleSentence: Online resources can supplement traditional textbooks effectively.
cards.exampleTranslation: Çevrimiçi kaynaklar geleneksel ders kitaplarını etkili şekilde tamamlayabilir.

cards.englishDefinition: conforming to the law or to rules; able to be defended with logic
cards.exampleSentence: The researchers raised legitimate concerns about the methodology.
cards.exampleTranslation: Araştırmacılar metodoloji hakkında meşru endişeler dile getirdiler.
